front.title: A Unified Stateful/Stateless Autoconfiguration Service for IPv6

abstract.t: IPv6 Neighbor Discovery (IPv6ND) specifies a control message set for nodes to discover neighbors, routers, prefixes and other services on the link. It also supports a manner of StateLess Address AutoConfiguration (SLAAC). The Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol for IPv6 (DHCPv6) specifies a separate stateful autoconfiguration service. This document presents IPv6ND extensions for providing a unified stateful/stateless autoconfiguration service.
